archetype_name: Family Low-Carb Weeknight Bowls & Wraps (15–30, Mild)
name: Lemon-Tahini Salmon Bowls with Cauliflower Rice
description: Mild, low-carb salmon and broccoli bowls over cauliflower rice with a quick lemon-tahini drizzle. Simple, weeknight-friendly and family-ready.
prep_steps: Zest and juice the lemon (about 2–3 tbsp juice).
Pat salmon dry with paper towels.
cook_steps: On a sheet pan, toss broccoli with 1.5 tbsp olive oil, a pinch of salt and pepper; spread in a single layer.
Place salmon on the same pan; rub with 1 tbsp olive oil, half the minced garlic, a big pinch of salt and pepper, and half the lemon zest.
Roast 12–15 minutes until salmon flakes and broccoli is tender with crisp edges.
While roasting, warm cauliflower rice in a large skillet over medium with 1 tbsp olive oil and remaining garlic for 3–4 minutes; season with salt and pepper.
In a small bowl, whisk tahini with lemon juice, remaining lemon zest, a pinch of salt, and just enough water to make a pourable sauce.
Build bowls: divide cauliflower rice, top with salmon (flaked or in portions) and roasted broccoli, drizzle lemon-tahini sauce, and finish with parsley.
